offset.description: The offset used in the current page.

count.description: The number of resource instances returned in the current range.

hasMore.description: Returns true if more resources are available on the server than the subset returned in current page.

limit.description: The paging size used by the server.

deactivationDate.description: Date on which the service contract ends.

rootDisplay.description: The public, non-unique key for the root product instance. For example, phone number or serial number.

serviceId.description: An invariant key that uniquely identifies the asset / component for the lifetime of the asset. It will be unique across all asset repositories.

displayName.description: The public, non-unique key for the product instance. For example, phone number or serial number.

currency.description: Currency code for the discount amount.

value.description: Amount value for the discount amount.

recurringChargeFrequency.description: The period for the fixed recurring charge. For example, Per Month.

dateAdded.description: System field indicating the date on which the Resource was created.

currencyCode.description: Unique currency code for the currency.

currency.description: Currency code for the usage net amount.

value.description: Amount value for the usage net amount.

serviceId.description: An invariant key that uniquely identifies the asset / component for the lifetime of the asset. It will be unique across all asset repositories.

serviceAccountId.description: The customer that owns the product.

recurringChargeDuration.description: The payment terms. For example, Net 30.

dateModified.description: System field indicating the date on which the Resource was last modified.

usageUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the usage charges. For example, Per Copy or Per Minute.

suspendDate.description: Date on which the service suspends.

parentDisplay.description: The public, non-unique key for the parent product instance. For example, phone number or serial number.

attributes.description: A collection (JSON) of key/value pair attributes that define the configuration of this asset/component.

activationDate.description: Date on which the service contract starts.

serviceId.description: An invariant key that uniquely identifies the asset / component for the lifetime of the asset. It will be unique across all asset repositories.

resumeDate.description: Date on which the service contract resumes.

currency.description: Currency code for the recurring amount.

value.description: Amount value for the recurring amount.

displayValue.description: Translated display value of the fixed list of value for status.

lookupCode.description: Language independent code of the fixed list of value for status.

id.description: Id of the fixed list of value for status.
